properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT * FROM M_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7
SELECT BRD_NO, CATEGORY_NM, BRD_TITLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT BRD_NO, CATEGORY_NM, BRD_TITLE FROM V_BOARD WHERE BRD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7

SELECT CHLNG_NO, CHLNG_CATE_NM, CHLNG_TITLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT CHLNG_NO, CHLNG_CATE_NM, CHLNG_TITLE FROM V_CHALLENGE_MISSION WHERE CHLNG_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CHLNG_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7

SELECT CHLNG_BRD_NO, CHLNG_CATE_NM, CHLNG_BRD_TITLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT CHLNG_BRD_NO, CHLNG_CATE_NM, CHLNG_BRD_TITLE FROM V_CHALLENGERS WHERE CHLNG_BRD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CHLNG_BRD_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7
